title: Quarkus 1.12.1.Final released - Bugfixes
content: 1.12.1.Final is a maintenance release fixing bugs and improving the documentation. 1.12.1.Final is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.11. If you are not using 1.12 already, please refer to the 1.12 migration guide. Whatâ€™s new? Full changelog You can get the full changelog of 1.12.1.Final on GitHub. Come...
